subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The top-seeded RogerFederer and Rafael Nadal, seeded No. 2 and the closest thing Federer has to a nemesis, both won in straight sets Wednesday at the U.S. Open.
snippet: The top-seeded RogerFederer and Rafael Nadal, seeded No. 2 and the closest thing Federer has to a nemesis, both won in straight sets Wednesday at the U.S. Open.
